refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: int X509_NAME_get0_der(X509_NAME *nm, const unsigned char **pder, size_t *pderlen)

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The function X509_NAME_get0_der() returns an internal pointer to the encoding of an X509_NAME structure in *pder and consisting of *pderlen bytes. It is useful for applications that wish to examine the encoding of an X509_NAME structure without copying it.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: The function X509_NAME_get0_der() returns 1 for success and 0 if an error occurred.
